coreAtributes.determiner: a pair of elbow-length latex gloves
coreAtributes.name: elbow-length latex glove
coreAtributes.description: A pair of shiny, elbow-length latex gloves.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [npc.name]'s [npc.hand] and roughly pull [npc.her] gloves off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs your [pc.hand] and roughly pulls your gloves off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs [npc2.name]'s [npc2.hand] and roughly pulls [npc2.name]'s gloves off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the gloves and pull them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.hand] into the gloves and pull them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.her] [npc.hand] into the gloves and pull them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts [npc.her] [npc.hand] into the gloves and pulls them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.hand] into the gloves, before pulling them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces your [pc.hand] into the gloves and pulls them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.hand] into the gloves, before pulling them into place with a final snap.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces [npc2.name]'s [npc2.hand] into the gloves, before pulling them into place with a final snap.
